item.title: Azure Linux Images
item.description: Here is a table with the latest linux images and the installed kernel version. Distro Image Kernel Ubuntu 16.04 Canonical:UbuntuServer:16.04-LTS:latest 4.13.0-1007-azure Ubuntu 17.10 Canonical:UbuntuServer:17.10:latest 4.13.0-32-generic Ubuntu 18.10 Canonical:UbuntuServer:18.04-DAILY-LTS:latest 4.13.0-32-generic Centos 7.3 OpenLogic:CentOS:7.3:latest Centos 7.4 OpenLogic:CentOS:7.4:latest RHEL 7.4 RedHat:RHEL:7-RAW:latest 3.10.0-693.11.6 RHEL 7.3 RedHat:RHEL:7.3:latest 3.10.0-514.28.1 SLES 12-SP3 SUSE:SLES:12-SP3:latest 4.4.103-6.38-default
